thread.title: Emmerdale shock as Laurel Thomas HITS Gabby after losing virginity in her and Ashley's marital bed
thread.title_full: Emmerdale shock as Laurel Thomas HITS Gabby after losing virginity in her and Ashley's marital bed

author: Hayley Minn
title: Emmerdale shock as Laurel Thomas HITS Gabby after losing virginity in her and Ashley's marital bed
text:
Emmerdale shock as Laurel Thomas HITS Gabby after losing virginity in her and Ashley's marital bed Viewers of the ITV soap were angered by the teen's actions Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Emmerdale viewers were shocked as Laurel Thomas hit her daughter Gabby in tonight's episode. 
Both are continuing to struggle with their husband and father Ashley's dementia, Gabby got drunk and ended up losing her virginity to a boy called Josh. 
As Laurel came home from seeing Ashley at the care home, she was horrified to see a sheepish Gabby coming down the stairs with Josh. 
But it got even more awkward as Laurel questioned Gabby: "Did you use precaution?" Read More (Photo: ITV) 
When Gabby didn't answer, she continued: "Bring your sheets down." 
But the REAL bombshell was when the teen hit back: "It's not my sheets I need to bring down." 
Releasing a howl of rage, Laurel smacked Gabby across the face, leaving them both in shock. 
Laurel tried to apologise but viewers of the ITV soap insisted Gabby "deserved it". Read More (Photo: ITV) 
One said: "Gabby fully deserved that slap." 
Another added: "Oh my god Gabby would have got a whole lot more than a slap if I was Laurel #vilechild #emmerdale #kickherout." 
A third agreed: "I would have slapped her as well." 
*Emmerdale continues on ITV1 weekdays at 7pm Like us on Facebook
